chunks.content: Marketing strategy involves creating customer value and building profitable customer relationships. Companies must design a customer value-driven marketing strategy that guides the marketing mix decisions. The marketing concept holds that achieving organizational goals depends on knowing the needs and wants of target markets.

chunks.content: Product differentiation helps companies stand out in competitive markets. Market segmentation involves dividing a market into distinct groups of buyers with different needs and characteristics.
